name: Johnson's Milk + Rice Baby Bath
description:
Free of parabens, phthalates, sulfates or dye   • pH-balanced, hypoallergenic, and pediatrician-tested   • Contains milk proteins, rice extracts, vitamins, and minerals   • Clinically proven to be mild, helps keep baby’s skin soft and smooth   • Best when used together with Johnson's Milk + Rice Lotion   • Ideal for both mom & baby      How to Use:   • You can use it anytime you bathe your baby. Also use on a soft wet washcloth for in-between bath wash-ups.   • Wet baby’s hair and body with warm water.    • Apply top-to-toe® with your hand or washcloth.   • Gently lather, rinse and snuggle.

name: Parachute Just for Baby - Baby Oil (Free Baby Face Cream 50 gm)
description:
Parachute Just for Baby - Baby Oil  Just for Baby Oil with goodness of Natural Olive & Almond oil gets easily absorbed in your baby’s skin and it is great for everyday massage. Regular massage with this rich nourishing oil enriched with vitamin E promotes your Baby’s bone development. Applying Just for Baby Oil creates a protective barrier on Baby’s skin that locks moisture & keeps your baby’s skin soft.     It has been tested for allergy & formulated with safe ingredients.

name: Parachute Just for Baby - Baby Shampoo
description:
Your baby’s hair and scalp are delicate and need extra care. That is why Parachute Just for Baby has developed its baby Shampoo. Enriched with the goodness of Olive oil and Almond Milk, this baby shampoo is designed to gently cleanse your baby’s scalp and keep their hair soft. Let your baby enjoy bath time with the No-Tears Formula.      Directions: Wet your baby’s hair, apply a coin-sized drop of Parachute Just For Baby Shampoo on to your hands. Massage gently on to your baby’s wet hair and rinse.      Benefits:  - No Tears Formula  - Made Safe certified  - Australian Allergy Certified  - Paraben free  - Sulfate free  - Color free  - safe ingredients  - pH balanced  - Dermatologically Tested      Ingredients:  Aqua , Cocamidopropyl Betain, Sodium Cocoyl Isothinate , Glycerin, PEG-150 Distearate, Almond Milk, Olive oil, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Perfume      Caution: For external use only. In case of irritation, rinse off and discontinue use. Keep away from heat, direct sunlight, & reach of children. Store in a cool & dry place.    Parachute Just for Baby Shampoo is available in 2 sizes- 100ml and 200ml. The Parachute Just for Baby care range is a product of Marico Bangladesh.

name: Parachute Just For Baby - Baby Wash (Free 75 gm Baby Soap)
description:
Parachute Just for Baby - Baby Wash  Just for Baby Body & Hair wash gently cleanses your baby’s hair and body, leaving it nicely scented. No tears formula lets your baby enjoy the bath while maintaining natural softness of Baby’s skin. It has been tested for allergy & formulated with  safe ingredients. Parachute Just for Baby - Baby Soap  Just for Baby Soapwith goodness of Almond Milk & Olive Oil creates a barrier that locks moisture for 24 hours & protects your baby’s beautiful skin from dryness. This rich nourishing lotion enriched with vitamin E gets easily absorbed in your baby’s skin & keeps it smooth and soft naturally.

name: Johnson's Baby Cream
description:
2 out of 3 babies have dry skin. Baby skin is 3 times thinner than adult skin and hence loses moisture very fast. The NEW JOHNSON’S® Baby Cream which Nourishes and hydrates up to 24 hours and helps keep Baby skin soft and gentle all day long. Its fast absorbing formula contains rich emollients that help moisturize and preserve baby skin’s natural softness to protect your baby from chapped knees, rubbed elbows and tender noses. • Clinically Proven Mild  •Gentle Care. From Day 1.  • Baby soft skin. All day long.  • Recommended by Doctors  • pH Balanced & Hypoallergenic  • No added parabens, sulphates or dyes  • Made with only purposeful ingredients  • Transparent. Mild. Visibly Pure. How to Use:  • Use JOHNSON’S Baby Cream after your baby's bath, or anytime your baby has dry skin.  • Massage over body gently to soften baby’s dry skin.  • Enjoy this moment of bonding together.

name: Johnson's Baby Oil with Vitamin E
description:
Your baby's first emotional bonds are built from physical contact, serving as the foundation for emotional and intellectual development later in her life. Baby massage is a great bonding experience for you and your baby. Trust the JOHNSON’S® Baby Oil with vitamin E, for a perfect massage for your baby.This baby care product from Johnson’s is  • Specially formulated for babies  • The JOHNSON'S® baby oil is a safe baby oil  • Perfectly suitable for new born babies  • Gentle formula nourishes the skin, making it smooth and soft.  • Pure mineral oil is non-sticky. Thus, your sweet little angel will feel safe and not uncomfortable. • Comes with a mild fragrance that stays for a long time  • Great for parent-baby bonding.  • Clinically proven mild and gentle formula for your baby’s skin.  • Dermatologist and allergy-tested    How to use  • Use before bath to give your baby a nourishing and relaxing massage. • Apply in small quantities, using firm but gentle strokes.

name: Johnson's Baby Lotion For Baby Soft Skin
description:
2 out of 3 babies have dry skin. Baby skin is 3 times thinner than adult skin and hence loses moisture very fast.That’s why the NEW JOHNSON’S® baby lotion provides delicate baby skin with intensive 24-hour moisture. Its fast absorbing formula contains rich emollients that help moisturize and preserve baby skin’s natural softness. The baby lotion keeps delicate skin soft, gentle, smooth and feeling healthy. Nourish baby’s skin for 24 hours with our classic JOHNSON’S® fresh smell. Great for kids and adults too! • Clinically Proven Mild  • Gentle Care. From Day 1. • No Dyes. Only Baby soft skin • Nourishes and hydrates up to 24 hours  • Recommended by Doctors  • pH Balanced & Hypoallergenic  • No added parabens, sulphates or dyes  • Made with only purposeful ingredients  • Transparent. Mild. Visibly Pure.    How to Use: • Use JOHNSON'S® baby lotion after your baby's bath, or anytime your baby has dry skin.  • Apply lotion over entire body and enjoy skin that's protected, healthy feeling, and baby soft.

name: Johnson's Baby Soap
description:
A new born’s skin comes with a natural protective coating of moisturizing oils that cover their skin's outer layer. Wash away that oil and you might leave their tender skin vulnerable to dryness, irritation and rashes. For your baby’s soft skin, trust JOHNSON'S Baby Soap for the best care of your little one’s delicate skin. • Specially made for babies, enriched with 1/4th moisturizing baby lotion & Vitamin E  • Helps preserve the moisture and keeps the baby’s skin soft.   • Helps retain essential protective layers, thus it's a safe soap for baby. • Comes with a rich creamy lather that gently cleanses and helps maintain healthy skin. • Rinses easily!   • Comes with Triple Baby Protection. • No parabens & SLS, No Alcohol used. How to Use:  • With warm water and a soothing touch. bath time is a wonderful time to bond with your baby!  • The JOHNSON'S® Baby Soap bar cleanses gently, so you can use it anytime you bathe your baby.  • Lather soap on your hand and then gently apply on baby's skin.  • Rinse off.   • Dry and snuggle.

name: Johnson's Baby Powder Blossoms
description:
Baby's skin is much more sensitive than adults and hence more prone to irritation. Johnson's Baby Powder Blossom offers long lasting freshness and skin comfort to your baby’s delicate skin • Protects your baby's skin from excess moisture and leaves it soft and smooth. • Helps eliminate friction while keeping the skin cool and comfortable. • Made of millions of tiny, round, slippery plates that glide over each other, helping ease skin-irritation caused by coarse talc.   • Safe to use baby powder and provides a soothing comfort to your child  • With delicate floral fragrance  •  clinically proven mild and gentle • Dermatologist-tested and hypoallergenic.  • No Parabens, No Sulfates, No Dye How to Use:  • For baby, use after every bath and diaper change.   • For you, use anytime you want skin to feel soft, fresh and comfortable. • Shake powder directly into your hand, away from the face, before smoothing onto baby’s skin. • Close tightly after each use  • Store in a cool, dry place.

name: Parachute Just For Baby - Baby Face Cream
description:
Your baby’s skin is delicate and needs special care. International expert in Safe Baby care, Parachute Just for BabyTM  Baby Face Cream is enriched with goodness of Olive oil and Almond milk. It works gently, moisturizing your baby’s soft face, keeping it healthy, supple and dryness-free, all day long  TESTED FOR ALLERGY AND FORMULATED WITH 100% SAFE INGREDIENTS    Ingredients:  Aqua, Cocos nucifera oil, Elaeis guineensis butter, Glycerine, Cetyl alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate (and) PEG-100 Stearate, Olive oil, Almond milk, Phenoxyethanol and ethylhexyl glycerin, Carbomer, Perfume, Tapioca Starch, Sodium Hydroxide, Butylated Hydroxy Toluene, Disodium EDTA.

name: Kodomo Baby Powder (3+) Natural Soft Protection
Meril Baby Mild Honey Soap
description:
Baby's skin is very thin and delicate which loses moisture very quickly. Harsh nature of regular soap causes harm to the babies' skin. Just like specialized baby products, you need specialized soaps to bathe your baby. Meril is proud to bring Meril Baby soap infused with lotion and honey. Meril Baby soap is 5 times milder than regular soap. It gently cleans baby's skin without drying or irritating. The lotion and honey gives moisturizer to the babies' skin. Presence of Honey also makes babies skin soft, supple and healthy. This soap moisturizes baby's skin even while bathing. So, ensure the best care and growth of your baby by regular use of Meril Baby Soap. Ingredients: Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Aqua, Baby Lotion, Honey, Glycerine, Fragrance, Titanium dioxide, Sunflower Oil, EDTA, CI 45100, CI 11680

name: Meril Baby Shampoo
description:
Meril Baby Shampoo 110 ml is specially formulated to gently cleanse your baby's delicate hair and scalp with a mild, tear-free formula. Enriched with natural ingredients, it nourishes and hydrates, ensuring softness and shine. Ideal for sensitive skin, this shampoo is free from harsh chemicals and prevents eye irritation, making bath time enjoyable. It rinses off easily without residue. Simply apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly for clean, healthy hair every day.
Meril Baby Shampoo 110 ml is specially formulated to gently cleanse your baby's delicate hair and scalp with a mild, tear-free formula. Enriched with natural ingredients, it nourishes and hydrates, ensuring softness and shine. Ideal for sensitive skin, this shampoo is free from harsh chemicals and prevents eye irritation, making bath time enjoyable. It rinses off easily without residue. Simply apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly for clean, healthy hair every day.

name: Parachute Just For Baby - Milky Glow Baby Wash
description:
Parachute Just for Baby Milky Glow Baby Wash gently cleanses your baby’s hair and body, giving it a healthy glow. It has a no-tears formula that lets your baby enjoy the bath. Formulated with gentle ingredients, the baby wash helps maintain the natural softness of the baby’s skin. With  safe ingredients & an allergy-tested formula, Parachute Just For Baby Wash nourishes, protects, and softens your Baby's skin while maintaining the right pH balance.  To use the baby wash on your little angel – wet baby’s body with warm water and apply Parachute Just For Baby Wash with hand/cloth. Gently lather and rinse off.  Parachute Just For Baby Wash is for external use only. In case of irritation, rinse off and discontinue use. Keep away from heat, direct sunlight, & reach of children. Store in a cool & dry place away from sunlight.  The Parachute Just for Baby care range is enriched with Paraben Free ingredients,natural moisturizers, and is Australian Allergy Certified and MadeSafe Certified.  Parachute Just for Baby Milky Glow Baby Wash is available in 2 sizes- 100ml and 200ml. Parachute Just for Baby Milky Glow Baby Wash is a product of Marico Bangladesh Ltd.

name: Sepnil Anti-Bacterial Soap Bar
description:
Sepnil Anti-Bacterial Soap is a convenient soap that provides long-lasting protection against germs and bacteria. It's enriched with moisturizing agents like glycerin and coconut oil to keep your skin soft and supple.

name: Johnson's Baby Top-To-Toe Bath
description:
Even though your baby's skin may look perfect, but it is very delicate and is three times more sensitive than adults. So, baby skin needs extra special care throughout the first days, months and years of life. That is why the NEW JOHNSON’S® baby TOP-TO-TOE® wash is an ultra-mild cleanser designed for your baby’s delicate skin and sensitive eyes. It is a safe baby wash product, milder than a baby soap, and is as gentle to the eyes as pure water that soothes your baby during bath time.    It’s the  choice of hospitals* for a Baby’s bath and gentle enough to cleanse sensitive newborn skin without drying from Day 1. • No More Tears formula  •Gentle Care. From Day 1. • As mild as pure water  • Hospital’s choice for 1st bath  • Clinically proven mild  • Recommended by Doctors  • pH Balanced & Hypoallergenic  • No added parabens, sulphates or dyes  • Made with only purposeful ingredients  • Transparent. Mild. Visibly Pure. How to Use:  • You can use it anytime you bathe your baby. Also use on a soft wet washcloth for in-between bath wash-ups.  • Wet baby’s hair and body with warm water. • Apply top-to-toe® with your hand or washcloth  • Gently lather, rinse and snuggle.

name: Johnson's Baby Milk Soap
description:
A new born’s skin comes with a natural protective coating of moisturizing oils that cover their skin's outer layer. Wash away that oil and you might leave their tender skin vulnerable to dryness, irritation and rashes. For your baby’s soft skin, trust JOHNSON'S Baby Milk Soap for the best care of your little one’s delicate skin.    • Specially made for babies, contains natural milk proteins and vitamin E, to help deliver complete skin nourishment, for baby skin that is soft, smooth, and healthy.  • Comes with a rich creamy lather that gently cleanses and helps maintain healthy skin.   • Rinses easily! • Comes with Triple Baby Protection. • No parabens & SLS, No Alcohol used. How to Use:  • With warm water and a soothing touch. bath time is a wonderful time to bond with your baby!  • The JOHNSON'S® Baby Soap bar cleanses gently, so you can use it anytime you bathe your baby.  • Lather soap on your hand and then gently apply on baby's skin.• Rinse off. • Dry and snuggle.

name: Johnson's Baby Powder
description:
Baby's skin is much more sensitive than adults and hence more prone to irritation. Johnson's Baby Powder offers long lasting freshness and skin comfort to your baby’s delicate skin  • It is a safe talcum powder made especially for babies, made with U.S. Pharmacopoeia grade talc to ensure it meets the highest quality & purity  • Helps eliminate friction  • Clean, classic baby-fresh scent  • Clinically proven to be gentle and mild for your baby’s skin  • Best for baby, causes no allergy or irritation to baby's skin  • Keeps babies feeling fresh and playful  • Dermatologist-tested and hypoallergenic.  • No Parabens, No Sulfates, No Dye How to Use:  • For baby, use after every bath and diaper change. • For you, use anytime you want skin to feel soft, fresh and comfortable. • Shake powder directly into your hand, away from the face, before smoothing onto baby’s skin. • Close tightly after each use  • Store in a cool, dry place.

name: Johnson's Baby Cream Milk + Rice
description:
2 out of 3 babies have dry skin. Baby skin is 3 times thinner than adult skin and hence loses moisture very fast. The NEW JOHNSON’S Baby Milk + rice Cream is gentle and contains a unique combination of natural milk extracts & Vitamin E. With double nourishment, this product helps replenish moisture to leave skin feeling baby soft all day long. Contains rich emollients and added moisturizers which help to give skin an immediate moisture boost. • Clinically Proven Mild  •Gentle Care. From Day 1.  • For baby's healthy looking skin  • With milk proteins and multiple vitamins  • pH Balanced & Hypoallergenic  • No added parabens, sulphates or dyes  • Made with only purposeful ingredients  •Transparent. Mild. Visibly Pure. How to Use:  • Use JOHNSON’S baby milk cream after your baby's bath, or anytime your baby has dry skin.  • Massage over body gently to soften baby’s dry skin.  • Enjoy this moment of bonding together.

name: Johnson's Baby Oil With Vitamin E
description:
Your baby's first emotional bonds are built from physical contact, serving as the foundation for emotional and intellectual development later in her life. Baby massage is a great bonding experience for you and your baby. Trust the JOHNSON’S® Baby Oil with vitamin E, for a perfect massage for your baby. This baby care product from Johnson’s is  • Specially formulated for babies  • The JOHNSON'S® baby oil is a safe baby oil   • Perfectly suitable for new born babies  • Gentle formula nourishes the skin, making it smooth and soft.  • Pure mineral oil is non-sticky. Thus, your sweet little angel will feel safe and not uncomfortable. • Comes with a mild fragrance that stays for a long time  • Great for parent-baby bonding.  • Clinically proven mild and gentle formula for your baby’s skin.  • Dermatologist and allergy-tested    How to use  • Use before bath to give your baby a nourishing and relaxing massage. • Apply in small quantities, using firm but gentle strokes.

Thus, your sweet little angel will feel safe and not uncomfortable. • Comes with a mild fragrance that stays for a long time  • Great for parent-baby bonding.  • Clinically proven mild and gentle formula for your baby’s skin.  • Dermatologist and allergy-tested    How to use  • Use before bath to give your baby a nourishing and relaxing massage. • Apply in small quantities, using firm but gentle strokes.

name: Johnson's Baby Powder Blossoms
description:
Baby's skin is much more sensitive than adults and hence more prone to irritation. Johnson's Baby Powder Blossom offers long lasting freshness and skin comfort to your baby’s delicate skin    • Protects your baby's skin from excess moisture and leaves it soft and smooth. • Helps eliminate friction while keeping the skin cool and comfortable.   • Made of millions of tiny, round, slippery plates that glide over each other, helping ease skin-irritation caused by coarse talc. • Safe to use baby powder and provides a soothing comfort to your child  • With delicate floral fragrance •clinically proven mild and gentle • Dermatologist-tested and hypoallergenic.  • No Parabens, No Sulfates, No Dye How to Use:• For baby, use after every bath and diaper change. • For you, use anytime you want skin to feel soft, fresh and comfortable. • Shake powder directly into your hand, away from the face, before smoothing onto baby’s skin. • Close tightly after each use  • Store in a cool, dry place.

name: Parachute Just For Baby - Baby Soap
description:
Just for Baby Soapwith goodness of Almond Milk & Olive Oil creates a barrier that locks moisture for 24 hours & protects your baby’s beautiful skin from dryness. This rich nourishing lotion enriched with vitamin E gets easily absorbed in your baby’s skin & keeps it smooth and soft naturally.

name: Twinkle Baby Soap
description:
Twinkle Baby Soap 75 gm is a gentle and effective soap that is specially formulated for babies. It contains Vitamin E, Cocoa Butter, and Milk Protein that helps to keep your baby’s skin soft and moisturized. The soap has an anti-bacterial formula that helps to protect your baby’s skin from germs and bacteria.

name: Johnson's Baby Powder Blossoms
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from Italy. Introducing Johnson's Baby Powder Blossoms, a beloved classic reimagined with the delightful scent of blossoms. This 400 gm container of baby powder is designed to provide gentle care and protection for your baby's delicate skin. With its soft and soothing formula, it helps keep your baby's skin dry, comfortable, and beautifully fragranced throughout the day.

name: Parachute Just For Baby - Baby Oil
description:
Parachute Just for Baby - Baby OilJust for Baby Oil with the goodness of Natural Olive & Almond oil gets easily absorbed in your baby’s skin and it is great for everyday massage. Regular massage with this rich nourishing oil enriched with vitamin E promotes your Baby’s bone development. Applying Just for Baby Oil creates a protective barrier on your Baby’s skin that locks moisture & keeps your baby’s skin soft. It has been tested for allergy & formulated with 100% safe ingredients.
